creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: rocky outcropping at top with downward pointing branches and waterfall obscured by mist; large rocks at bottom with foliage; inscribed verse at L and down R edge
inscription: R edge; LLQ (additional verse added subsequently by the artist)
markings: mark on closed scroll, red pen, ULC: [No. 1916 / Shunkin]; marks on back of scroll URC, in Japanese; Seals: [Kisen no in]; [Shunkin Koji]
medium: Ink and light color on silk
signed: signature: [Painted and inscribed in the autumn, the eighth month of 1821 / Shunkin Kisen]; date: [autumn, Bunsei 7]
title: Yōrō Waterfall
